EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for visiting Pivotal at VMworld
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
It Was Great to See You. Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for dropping by our Pivotal booth last week at VMworld 2013. There was a lot of buzz and excitement around new products and partnerships. In case you missed it:
- We partnered with VMware to co-develop Pivotal CF, a commercially supported hybrid Platform as a Service (PaaS) based on the Cloud Foundry platform. Pivotal CF will be made available on VMware vSphere® and vCloud® Hybrid Service™ later this year. See a demo of Pivotal CF <http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F-0G9_Pwi1U&feature=player_embedded>.
- We announced the availability of Pivotal HD (Hadoop Distribution) on VMware vSphere®. Download your free 60-day trial of Pivotal HD now <http://www.gopivotal.com/pivotal-products/pivotal-data-fabric/pivotal-hd#4>.
A lot more to come next week in Santa Clara:
>> Platform CF: The Cloud Foundry Conference <http://www.platformcf.com/> September 8-9. An event for developers and cloud operators that are using the industry's leading Open Source Platform-as-a-Service: Cloud Foundry.
>> SpringOne 2GX 2013 Conference <http://www.springone2gx.com/conference/santa_clara/2013/09/home> September 9-12. A one-of-a-kind conference for application developers, solution architects, web operations and IT teams who develop business applications, create multi-device aware web applications, design cloud architectures, and manage high performance infrastructure.
Thank you,
The Pivotal Team
